title: U-God Interview and more
itunes:title: U-God Interview and more
description:
Thursday 3/8- Today on the show we had U- God stop by to speak on his new book "Raw", his relationship with Method Man and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to lil Xan for saying that Tupac's music is boring and Angela helped out some of our listeners, especially our women today for Ask since it is International Women's Day. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 3/8- Today on the show we had U- God stop by to speak on his new book "Raw", his relationship with Method Man and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to lil Xan for saying that Tupac's music is boring and Angela helped out some of our listeners, especially our women today for Ask since it is International Women's Day. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
